body.section: Hierarchy BloodPressureSleepStatusQualifier is a kind of ObservationQualifier

section.title: Description
section.p: Blood pressure normally rises and falls depending on whether a person is awake or asleep. This class records an observation of whether the patient was awake or asleep at the time that the Blood Pressure measurement was taken.

stentry.p: This property defines what was observed that “qualifies” the primary, or “owning” Observation. This property defines what was observed by citing a value from a nationally recognized coding system. In this case, the value will hard-coded to a LOINC or SNOMED code that represents the concept of Sleep Status.

This property contains the result, or value of the qualifying Observation. In the generic Observation Qualifier class, the data type for this property can be anything. In this sub-type, the value is constrained to be one of a set of codes from the SNOMED-CT coding system that represent whether the patient was awake or asleep.
